column3: > I can't see the error \n\nIt should be possible to reproduce with the reproducer input in the OP

Tested fae4ee5.

<details>
  <summary>Was able to reproduce with master (c85714863)</summary>
  
```
python infra/helper.py reproduce bitcoin-core coins_view clusterfuzz-testcase-minimized-coins_view-6109460079706112
Running: docker run --rm --privileged -i -v /home/jonas/oss-fuzz/build/out/bitcoin-core:/out -v /home/jonas/clusterfuzz-testcase-minimized-coins_view-6109460079706112:/t

Of course you can reproduce this inside Docker, if you want, but the recommended way to reproduce is to use "your build and test system" (https://google.github.io/oss-fuzz/advanced-topics/reproducing/#fuzz-target-bugs). This would be https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/fuzzing.md .\n\nDocker can always be used as a backup in case it it not trivial to build with the sanitizers for
